description.value:
Trigger A creature spends more than 1 round in the room without speaking aloud the phrases appearing in the alcove.

Effect The creature takes [[/r 12d6[cold]]] damage (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:41|basic:true], plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Immobilized]{Immobilized} for 1 minute on a critical failure). The trap then rolls initiative.

stealth.details: (legendary) to recognize the symbols as a magical trap

details.description: Magical letters reveal phrases in Aklo that, if not properly spoken aloud, inflict numbing cold.
details.disable: @Check[type:occultism|dc:47] (master) or @Check[type:religion|dc:49] (master) three times in a row to successfully speak aloud the esoteric phrases as they appear (this causes the trap to deactivate for 1 hour, although the phrases continue to appear during this time), or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Dispel Magic]{Dispel Magic} (9th level, counteract DC 38).
details.reset: The trap deactivates 1 round after it has no target creatures and resets after 1 minute.
details.routine: (1 action) The trap fills the entirety of area B4 with additional blasts of cold. All creatures in area B4 take [[/r 12d6[cold]]] damage (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:41|basic:true], plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Immobilized]{Immobilized} for 1 minute on a critical failure).
